description.value:
Your association with chaotic magic grants you access to certain spells. Starting at 1st level when you choose this origin, and again at 3rd, 5th, 7th, and 9th level, you learn the spells listed for that level in the Wild Magic Spells table. The spells count as sorcerer spells for you, but don't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Wild Magic Spells

Sorcerer Level Spells
1st @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.95K2aUhAGV9qXjnf]{Bane}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.D6EB3ZJOSDCGAEC4]{Chaos Bolt}
3rd @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.UDUnlfPsOAbq2RSE]{Blur}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{Enlarge/Reduce}
5th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.GSvLWcdCZLQkilXT]{Blink}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.NBTD4H4INIB6C4EL]{Hunger of Hadar}
7th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{Confusion}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]{Polymorph}
9th @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.MQIO0I5IJWSBRN9P]{Chaotic Wellspring}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.WZH6KNXAYXQ7UY78]{Temporal Shunt}
